name: Perl ModInfo Descriptor File
summary: Learn about .MFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MFO files must be stored in the same directory as the Perl module (.PM) file in order to be read by ModInfo.

description: XML file containing metadata about one or more objects within a Perl module; created by running a Perl module through the modinfo2xml.pl processor; used by ModInfo, a Perl interface definition system.
